legal.termsIntro: Welcome to The Box. By using our service, you agree to these terms.
legal.termsAcceptance: By accessing The Box, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.
legal.termsService: The Box is a guessing game based on video game screenshots. The service offers daily challenges and multiplayer modes.
legal.termsAccount: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
legal.termsContent: Screenshots used in the game are the property of their respective publishers. The Box does not claim any rights to this content and uses it for educational and entertainment purposes.
legal.termsConduct: You agree not to cheat, exploit bugs, or engage in behavior that harms other players' experience.
legal.termsModification: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect upon publication on the site.
legal.privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect and use your data.
legal.privacyCollection: We collect information you provide during registration (email, username) as well as your game scores and statistics.
legal.privacyUsage: Your data is used to manage your account, display leaderboards, and improve our services. We never sell your personal data.
legal.privacyCookies: We use essential cookies for site functionality (session, language preferences). No advertising cookies are used.
legal.privacySecurity: We implement security measures to protect your data, including password encryption and secure HTTPS connections.
legal.privacyRights: In accordance with GDPR, you can request access, modification, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us.
legal.privacyContact: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us via our contact page.
legal.contactIntro: Have a question, suggestion, or problem? We're here to help.
legal.contactSocial: Follow us for the latest news and updates.
legal.contactBug: If you encounter a technical issue, please provide as much detail as possible to help us resolve it.
legal.contactResponseTime: We aim to respond within 48 hours.
legal.cookiesIntro: This policy explains how The Box uses cookies and similar technologies.
legal.cookiesWhat: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and improve your experience.
legal.cookiesTypes: We use only essential cookies required for the site to function properly. These include session cookies for authentication and preference cookies for language settings.
legal.cookiesEssential: These cookies are necessary for the website to work and cannot be disabled. They include: session tokens for login, language preferences, and game progress tracking.
legal.cookiesManage: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect site functionality. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies.
legal.cookiesChanges: We may update this cookie policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
legal.faqIntro: Find answers to common questions about The Box.
legal.faqAnswer1: The Box is a game where you guess video games from screenshots. Challenge yourself with daily puzzles or compete with friends in multiplayer mode.
legal.faqAnswer2: Look at the screenshot carefully, then type your guess for the game name. The faster you answer correctly, the more points you earn!
legal.faqQuestion3: Do I need an account to play?
legal.faqAnswer3: You can play as a guest, but creating an account allows you to save your scores, appear on leaderboards, and track your progress over time.
legal.faqAnswer4: Your score is based on accuracy and speed. Correct answers earn points, with bonus points for faster responses. Each round has a time limit.
legal.faqAnswer5: Daily challenges reset at midnight UTC. Everyone gets the same challenge each day, so you can compete fairly on the global leaderboard.
legal.faqQuestion6: How can I report a bug or suggest a feature?
legal.faqAnswer6: Visit our Contact page to reach out. We appreciate all feedback and work to improve the game based on player suggestions.
